alert.note: Alert for Cass (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 13 at 2:55AM CST until January 14 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM CST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Cass County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 3 PM CST Sunday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Sunday afternoon through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
